Class NonDeterministicMazeMDP

  • java.lang.Object
    • rl.MazeMarkovDecisionProcess
      • rl.NonDeterministicMazeMDP
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MarkovDecisionProcess

    public class NonDeterministicMazeMDP
extends MazeMarkovDecisionProcess
    A markov decision process representing a maze with non-deterministic actions
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yiqi (Victor) Chen yiqic1993@gmail.com
